title: How to Make Strawberry Ice Cubes

steps.headline: Put all of the ingredients together in a blender.
steps.description:
Mix until smooth. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/99\/Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/99\/Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Pour the blended mixture carefully into ice cube trays.
steps.description: Get even more creative by choosing a themed ice cube tray, like hearts, to make these ice cubes even more enticing.

steps.headline: Put in freezer and freeze for about 3 hours or until solid.
Drop a couple of cubes into a clear cocktail like vodka and soda.
steps.description:
Or, these cubes look lovely in a glass of white wine or champagne. Add the cubes to a pitcher of lemonade in the summertime; as the cubes melt, they diffuse the delicious strawberry flavour into your drink. Happy sipping! {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/3b\/Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/3b\/Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

text:
Prepare your ingredients. These are listed above. Put all of the ingredients together in a blender. Mix until smooth. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/99/Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-2Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/99/Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-2Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Pour the blended mixture carefully into ice cube trays. Get even more creative by choosing a themed ice cube tray, like hearts, to make these ice cubes even more enticing. Put in freezer and freeze for about 3 hours or until solid. Drop a couple of cubes into a clear cocktail like vodka and soda. Or, these cubes look lovely in a glass of white wine or champagne. Add the cubes to a pitcher of lemonade in the summertime; as the cubes melt, they diffuse the delicious strawberry flavour into your drink. Happy sipping! {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3b/Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-5Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3b/Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-5Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Strawberry-Ice-Cubes-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"
